_header: When I see on rood I-done
Subjects: Passion, meditations on; Christ, passion of

CamStJohn15.Transcription:
Wenne hic soe on rode idonihesus mi lemanand bi him
                    stondemaria and iohanhis herte duepe i-stungehis bodi wiþ
                    scurge i-sswengefor þe luve of anhiþe hi mai wepenand
                    selte teres letenief hic of luve chan

Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 62.
Stevick,  Robert D.,
                        ed.  
             One Hundred Middle English Lyrics.
         Indianapolis: Bobbs-Merrill, 1964: 22.
Woolf,  Rosemary. 
             The English Religious Lyric in the Middle Ages.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1968: 33.
Silverstein,  Theodore,
                        ed.  
             Medieval English Lyrics.
         York Medieval Texts. London: Edw. Arnold, 1971: 32.
